narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Apc Home Health Service, INC is a Respite Care provider based in El Paso, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $66.6M in Medicaid payments across 1.2M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $66.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
